doc.title: Event Stream Redesign - Technical Specification
doc.snippet: EventDetailModal shows event summary, dynamic form for additional details based on event type (medications: dosage override, notes; symptoms: severity, body location, triggers, notes; triggers: intensity, cause, notes; flares: photos, notes), photo attachment via camera/gallery, event linking, markdown notes, Save/Delete buttons

doc.title: Event Stream Redesign Epics
doc.section: Story 2.6: Event Detail Modal for Progressive Disclosure
doc.snippet: Opens from timeline tap or [Add Details] in quick-log modals. Shows event summary with type icon, time, name. Form fields vary by event type. Photo attachment button opens camera/gallery. Links to related events with suggestions. Markdown notes support (bold, lists). Save updates event, Delete with confirmation is destructive.

doc.title: UX Specification
doc.snippet: Modal patterns: full-screen on mobile, centered dialog on desktop. Progressive disclosure principle. WCAG 2.1 AA compliance with ARIA labels, keyboard navigation, focus management. Form validation patterns with aria-describedby.

doc.title: Solution Architecture
doc.snippet: Complex modal components pattern. Client-side rendering with React hooks for state management. TypeScript strict mode for type safety. Tailwind CSS for styling.

doc.title: PhotoLinker Component (reference pattern)
doc.snippet: Modal with backdrop, sticky header with close button, scrollable content, sticky footer with action buttons. Uses fixed positioning with z-50, backdrop blur, click-to-close on backdrop.

artifact.reason: Shows CRUD pattern for event repositories with update() method (AC #7). Demonstrates type validation and error handling patterns for event updates.
Pattern for updating trigger events with intensity field (AC #3). Shows validation for 'low' | 'medium' | 'high' intensity values.
Pattern for flare updates including photo attachments and notes (AC #3). Shows update methods for severity tracking and adding details.
Manages photo attachments with eventId linking (AC #4). create() and update() methods for attaching photos to events. Shows photo metadata handling.
Reference implementation for modal with entity linking pattern (AC #5). Shows event suggestions, selection state, save/cancel patterns, and modal structure.
Pattern for camera/gallery photo attachment (AC #4). Shows how to handle photo upload and storage integration.
Defines event record types with fields that can be updated via detail modal (dosage, notes, intensity, severity). Shows which fields are optional for progressive disclosure.
Pattern for "Add photo" button and photo gallery display (AC #4). Shows integration between photo capture and event attachment.

node.package: Icons for modal UI (X, Save, Trash)

markdown.library: Simple markdown parser for notes (AC #6). Alternative: react-markdown. Both support bold, lists, basic formatting.
React-based markdown rendering alternative. Requires remark plugins for full feature set.

architecture.constraint: Client-side rendering only - use 'use client' directive at top of component file
Repository pattern for all database operations - no direct Dexie calls in components
TypeScript strict mode - all props and state must be typed
Component structure: EventDetailModal.tsx in src/components/timeline/ directory
Follow existing modal patterns: fixed positioning, backdrop blur, z-50 for layering
Progressive disclosure: show minimal fields initially, expand based on user interaction

ui-patterns.constraint: Modal structure: backdrop â†’ fixed container â†’ sticky header â†’ scrollable content â†’ sticky footer
Responsive: full-screen on mobile (<768px), centered dialog on desktop (â‰¥768px)
Header: event summary with type emoji icon, formatted time, event name
Form validation: show errors inline with aria-describedby for screen readers
Dynamic forms: switch statement on event.type to render appropriate fields

accessibility.constraint: Keyboard navigation: Tab, Shift+Tab, Enter (save), Esc (close)
ARIA labels: aria-label on icon buttons, role="dialog", aria-describedby for errors
Focus management: auto-focus first input on modal open, restore focus on close
Screen reader: announce modal open/close, form validation errors
Color contrast: 4.5:1 for text, 3:1 for interactive elements

data-handling.constraint: All updates use repository.update(id, partialData) pattern
Delete requires confirmation dialog with explicit "Are you sure?" message
Photo attachment: create PhotoAttachment with eventId reference, not embedding
Event linking: query events from same day (24h window), show as suggestions
Markdown notes: sanitize input to prevent XSS, use DOMPurify or safe renderer
Timestamp preservation: never modify original event timestamp when updating details
